column4: I created a bootable usb stick of 10.04 server, I'm able to boot off it and start the isntall but it fails trying to detect the optical drive.  ( this machine does not have one ).  I'm not able to get the installatin to continue.  can anyone point me in the right direction?
the install program search for cdrom?
which step was it coz i don't remember there is a step like that
